A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi butchered the series. Everything that was in the earlier episodes no longer makes sense where a jedi can master the force as an adult in just three lessons? A Sith Lord was taken down in a blink of an eye? Whatever Luke Skywalker believed in and fought for in episode 4-6 seemed rubbish in the revelation in this film. There are so many good stories in books and video games out there\, could not the director of this film take a leaf out of them?
